title: Update Contact Details and Hero Background

Address is formatted clearly and readably

acceptanceCriteria: Phone number is displayed in the contact section
Phone number format includes the country code prefix

file_operations.description: Update the phone number in the Contact component to display '+96566339592' with proper formatting including the country code prefix

requirements.summary: Update Contact section operating hours with special day notes
acceptanceCriteria: Hours display shows all seven days of the week
Sunday through Thursday show 7 AM–10 PM
Friday and Saturday show 10 AM–10 PM
Wednesday includes Kuwait National Day note with 'Hours might differ'
Thursday includes Kuwait Liberation Day note with 'Hours might differ'
Hours are formatted clearly and consistently

file_operations.description: Update the operating hours section to display Sunday-Thursday 7 AM–10 PM and Friday-Saturday 10 AM–10 PM, with special notes for Wednesday (Kuwait National Day) and Thursday (Kuwait Liberation Day) indicating 'Hours might differ', ensuring clear and consistent formatting

requirements.summary: Replace hero section background with new generated image
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the new background image

Text remains readable over the new background

file_operations.description: Update the Hero component to use the new generated background image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-background.dim_1920x1080.png, ensuring the cosmic coffee shop aesthetic is maintained and text remains readable over the new background
